WRITING.TEXT: Its interesting that a creature that is usually thought of as being dangerous to mankind actual has the potential to save lives. US Navy scientists are utilizing shark antibodies integrated into biosensor platforms which can determine whether military military personnel have been exposed to chemical or biological agents. Currently the military uses mammalian derived antibodies in similar systems, but it has been found that the shark derived antibodies are actually more resiliant to higher temperatures thus increasing the utilities of such biosensors

He was a White Russian general during the Russian Civil War. For most of his life he was obsessed with East Asian culture. Mongolia had declared itself independent from China in 1911, but was subsequently reconquered by the Chinese. Under presssure from the Red Army, Von Ungarn attacked the Chinese in Monglia and drove them out. He installed Bogd Khan as nominal ruler of an independent Mongolian state, but was largely in control of the place himself. He made fantasical plans to conquer all of East Asia, and married a Manchu princess to give himself legitimacy. However, the Soviets put a damper on these plans and sponsered a Communist take over of the country. Von Unger launched a pre-emptive attack against Soviet and Far Eastern Republic forces preparing to invade Mongolia, but his offensive was repulsed. Vastly outnumbered, he retreated back to Mongolia. His troops however believed their cause was lost and requested that their army move east to link up with the remaining White Russian forces in the Russian Far East. Von-Ungern however gave orders that they were to move to then independent Tuva and eventually make their way to Tibet, who's ruler (the Dali Lama) Von Ungarn had been in contact with. This caused his troops to revolt against him, and they assasinated his second and command and tried to kill him as well. Deserted by all but a few die hards, Von Ungern was soon captured by Soviet partisans and executed by the Soviet government. The partisan leader who captured him later died under mysterious circumstances in 1927.

WRITING.TITLE: Nigeria's anti-corruption unit finds $43 million cash in Lagos apartment

WRITING.TEXT: Well, generally in negotiations for any good or service, you bid lower than your willing to pay in case the person your trying to buy from makes a counter-offer that way you have some leverage over what the ultimate price is.

The very first thing you need to do if your considering it is to get a copy of the contract and review it to make sure what the actual terms of the agreement are. Also as biencrudo states, it also makes sense to ask for more money than they are initially offering.

Christianity was a rapidly growing religion in Japan up until the [Shimbara Rebellion](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shimabara_Rebellion) in 1637 in which tens of thousands of Christian peasants revoltated against the Shogunate. After the rebellion was put down, the Shogunate doubled down on its efforts to exterminate Christianity in Japan, expelling the Portuguese missionaries and traders which had moved into parts of the country and exterminating the christian communities they had formed. [Some Christians went underground, and practiced their religion in secret passing it down generation by generation until the anti-christian laws were repealed in 1873.](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kakure_Kirishitan)
you wouldnt happen to have a link to that Whytes auction would you?
I did see the crease in the middle, anything from 50 to 58 is About Uncirculated.

This is whats called a small portrait note, as small portrait notes are currently being destroyed by the Federal Reserve as they recieve them, they are increasing in value. However, very high grade uncirculated notes are the ones that have signifigant premiums to them. The note you have looks like it would grade somewhere between Extra Fine and About Uncirculated. I've seen 1988 $100 About Uncirculated grade notes sell on ebay for $120 shipped, which means that after selling fees and shipping costs you would make about $5 if you managed to sell it. The risk of loss and fraud alone means that its not really worth your time to try to sell it.

WRITING.TEXT: [Cassini was only some 30 miles from the surface of Enceladus when it sailed through the hydrothermal plumes.](https://youtu.be/1pspud5eFY0) Its amazing how much information that Cassini has been able to gather about them considering that it wasn't even designed for such work. Hydrothermal vents on earth teem with life from Anaerobic bacteria to giant tube worms. I would suspect that if life was discovered on Enceladus it would function in a similar manner to life around hydrothermal vents here on Earth.

The place they take in the Berserk world is meant to mimick the role the Ottoman Empire played as a major rival to the Christian powers of Europe, just as the alliance of states that meets in Virantis to challenge them is meant to mimick the [Holy League](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Holy_League) alliances of the late middle ages which the Papacy rallied to oppose them. But as others have stated, they culturally mimic the various South Asian Empires of the late middle ages.

Back in the early 2000's there was a great deal of speculation that North Korea had the capability of putting containerized ballistic missile systems onto merchant vessels, and use them for counter attacks against the mainland United States in the event of American intervention in North Korea. I haven't seen anything on this recently and was wondering if there had been any further developments regarding this theory or if it had ever been proven as having been implemented by North Korea or any other state. I imagine Iran, Egypt, and several other countries could potentially develop the same thing. I know the Russians attempted to market the Club-K containerized missile system that operates on the same principle, but has anyone country purchased it?

WRITING.TITLE: Containerized ballistic missile systems on North Korean freighters, have such things been proven to exist?

The 2016 anime is a direct continuation from where the 2012 to 2013 movies left off, not the 1999 anime.
